block.p: MICHALOS-Daphne. Age 68. On September 15. Beloved mother of Renie Karidas, Dr. Peter Michalos, M.D., and George Michalos. Beloved wife of Argirios. Beloved sister of Penelope, Joanne and Lambrini. Grandmother of Dimos, Daphne, Irene, Arie and Peter. You were the best, loving and compassionate mother in the world. Your example will live in our hearts forever. For information on service, call Dahill Funeral Home: 718-336-2900.
